Windlord/Darkfate::



Darkfate was hit and fell bus he tried to Stood up again, Windlord 
shot him and stuned the metal dragon after that he landed near his 
pal and said worried"Kenzo are you ok?"

> Kenzo felt the sudden heat scarring him.  His metal flesh melted 
from
